title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install via pip and talk to local models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving chains, agents and retrieval full access to Ollama-hosted models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model hub) installable via Docker in one command.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic client for Rails and Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli (ggoonnzzaallo/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with history, themes and completion.

title: ollama-copilot (cmungall/ollama-copilot)
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chat (jacoblee/ollama-chat)
summary: Next.js/React chat interface with server-sent events, Markdown rendering and model selector.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama/ollama-csharp)
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; NuGet package with async streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger/dagger-modules/tree/main/ollama)
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter (adrianliechti/ollama-spring-boot-starter)
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama Java client for enterprise apps.

title: ollama-n8n-node (n8n-io/n8n-nodes-ollama)
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-r (ollama/ollama-r)
summary: Official R client for Ollama; install from CRAN and integrate with Shiny or RMarkdown.

title: ollama-docker-compose (techno-tim/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open-WebUI, GPU support and Watchtower updates.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Unofficial idiomatic Rust crate for Ollama with async Tokio client and CLI example.

title: ollama-php (ollama/ollama-php)
summary: Official PHP client for Ollama; Composer package with PSR-18 HTTP abstraction.
